events.name: Quadruped Meet and Discussion
events.marketing: Have you ever seen a quadruped in VRChat? Join us as we go over what bases are out there and how they work! Hang out after the discussion to meet some four legged friends!!

events.name: VR: A Digital Frontier Screening & Presentation
events.marketing: VR: A Digital Frontier: "Filmed inside the many worlds of virtual reality, this award-winning feature documentary dives into VR's history, usage, and future. Told through the many users and communities inside this digital space." Join us for a screening of the feature documentary, a short Q&A with the director (EvanTheFloydian) and members of cast and crew! Dive into the many worlds of filmmaking in virtual reality and see our stories on the big screen! This presentation will include Closed Captioning (in English).

events.name: The Spencer Show Shenanigans
events.marketing: Come along and join Spencer, Roger, and the rest of The Spencer Show for a fun live performance featuring skits, music, interactive games, dances, and plenty of chaotic energy!!

events.name: Omega By AstrixZ - Couture Catwalk: Fur Edition
events.marketing: Showcase your stylish fursona on the Couture Catwalk: Fashion Runway with Omega By AstrixZ ! Embrace the colours of your fur, twirl in your favorite outfits, and get to fully show off your creativity by telling your story!

Community.name: Omega
Community.description: Omega serves as both AstrixZ's Content Creation Community, whereby enjoyers of her content join to meet her, as well as a community dedicated to experiencing new things in VRC and keeping things fresh. Members are encouraged to meet new friends, join events & have fun, do something new and try new experiences. Omega is also a server for creators to showcase their craft, may it be Video/Audio Production, Avatar/World Creation, and many more!

events.name: Closing Ceremony and Q&A
events.marketing: The doors finally close on this Celebration of Creativity! We will be also hosting a Admin Panel Q&A after the closing cermony!

events.name: DMX in virtual spaces
events.marketing: Learn how clubs and communities are able to create wonderful virtual shows using commercial protocols such as DMX/Artnet

Community.name: HappyRobot33
Community.description: I Create world assets, udon scripts, and systems to support the community, along with helping run various projects. You may know me from my work as a co-developer on  Openflight!

events.name: Kuda's FBT Dancing Performance
events.marketing: Kudalyn's here to dance for you! An hour-long live FBT Dance performance just for PJKT:Fang! Hope to see you there!

Community.name: Kudalyn's Creations
Community.description: Hi! I'm Kuda, and I make customizable furry models for VRChat, along with various clothing and other accessories for them. I also host once a month meetups for my avatar community , so folks can show off what they've been working on, and bring their friends along to chill!

events.name: VR Workouts With Soaring Fitness
events.marketing:
We at Soaring Fitness are a community-driven fitness program operated by Hack Your Lives, a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, dedicated to making health and wellness freely accessible to everyone.

We'll be leading a virtual session where we'll show off all the different kinds of workouts we host at the gym, including a Full body exercise, Yoga, Taekwon-Do, and Dance.

Come join us and get sore today, so we can soar tomorrow!

Community.name: Soaring Fitness
Community.description: We are a VR-based workout group, focused on being freely accessible. Our hard working team of Volunteers offer their time and experience to make it all possible. Our Certified Personal Trainers work with our Volunteer Instructors to bring you workouts 7 days a week! We believe good health and fitness should not be gated behind a paywall!

events.name: The Basics of VR Filmmaking
events.marketing: An educational panel about the basics of filmmaking in VR and the challenges and collaborative process.

events.name: Games with Comrades And Ops
events.marketing: Comrades And Ops invites you to its signature event - 2 hours of VRChat games! Every Thursday at 6pm USA EST, we play two hours of high-capacity Quest-compatible games. Everyone is free to attend and bring their friends! Join us, and then join our Discord to get announcements about all our activities, and to host your own event!

Community.name: Comrades and Ops
Community.description: Comrades And Ops is a gaming and social group which brings people together in the name of fun, good times, and friendship. Our signature event is Thursday Games, a 2-hour gaming session in VRChat held every Thursday at 6pm USA EST. We host and play various games outside of VRChat and encourage participation in major events throughout VRChat and other gaming communities. All members are invited to host their own gaming or social event. Time to rock and roll!

events.name: Furnal Equinox 2026 Hype Night
events.marketing: Get hyped for Furnal Equinox! The biggest furry convention in Canada, Furnal Equinox welcomes you to its bi-weekly "hype night" event! Take a tour of our virtual worlds, see samples of our awesome vendors, and get your questions answered. Take a journey to the stars with our 2026 theme, "Starbound Sabbatical!

events.name: Meetup for furs in STEMM
events.marketing: Come meet with other scientists, techs, engineers, mathematicians, and medical specialists (STEMM) in the fur fandom, organized by DegenTech! Meet some of the techiest furs in VR!

Community.name: DegenTech Inc
Community.description: Group of professional furries working in STEMM fields (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Medical). We hangout in VR and organize on Discord! Check out some of the techiest nerds you'll meet on VRchat!

events.name: How To Not Get Scammed Online
events.marketing:
Don't be the next victim of an online scam!

You may know what to look for, but do your friends know?

Come join Commander A9 in his workshop on how to avoid getting scammed online. We will provide real-world examples of the types of scams specifically targeting the furry community, how to defeat them, and how you can help prevent others from becoming victims of online scams.

No experience, degree, or IT certification necessary! Come as you are and get ready to learn!

events.name: Mokuri Project Global Meetup
events.marketing: Mokuri Project is open furry IP with species designed by Akihito Tsukushi, creator of Made in Abyss, where anyone can create there own content based on it. Have any mokuri project avatar or just interested in project, join us!
